abilities.name: Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The hurricane is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:
* Cantrips (at will): blade ward, gust, light, prestidigitation
* 1st level (4 slots): feather fall, jump, thunderwave
* 2nd level (2 slots): gust of wind

abilities.name: Unarmored Defense.
abilities.description: While the hurricane is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

abilities.name: Unarmored Movement.
abilities.description: While the hurricane is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its walking speed increases by 15 feet (included in its speed).
